cast.name: 奥德拉·麦克唐纳 Audra McDonald

awards:
第68届黄金时段艾美奖(2016)
　　限定剧/迷你剧/电视电影类 最佳女主角(提名) 奥德拉·麦克唐纳

　　第23届美国演员工会奖(2017)
　　电视奖 电视电影/迷你剧最佳女演员(提名) 奥德拉·麦克唐纳
this_title: Lady Day at Emerson's Bar and Grill
trans_title: 埃莫森烧烤吧的戴女士
introduction: It's 1959 in a seedy bar in Philadelphia, and Billie Holiday is giving one of her last performances interlaced with salty, often humorous, reminiscences to project a riveting portrait of the lady and her music 4 months before her death.
chinese_title: 埃莫森烧烤吧的戴女士
foreign_title: Lady Day at Emerson's Bar and Grill
